passive.name: GLORY IN DEATH
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GLORY IN DEATH
                                Sion permanently gains 5 bonus health whenever he kills a unit, increased to 20 against large units, and champion takedowns.Upon talking fatal damage, Sion will reanimate himself Fearing those around him for 1 second, while slowing their Movement Speed by 90%. After reanimating, Sion can move and Attack, but his health rapidly decays while he is reanimated. Sion reanimates with 100% health, attacks at 1.75 attacks per second, gains 100% Physical Vamp , his attacks deal an additional 10% max Health  magic damage, copped at 75 bonus damage against monsters and deal 50% damage to structures.All of Sion's abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants him 67% Movement Speed  decaying over 2.38 seconds.

q.name: (Q) DECIMATING SMASH
q.description:
(Q) DECIMATING SMASH
 9/8/7/6s   45 
                                
                                
                                Sion charges a heavy blow for up to 1.75 seconds.Recast: Sion slams his axe down, briefly Slowing enemies hit by 50% for 0.25 seconds and dealing between 79 (50/75/100/125 + 45/55/65/75% ) and 187 (100/185/270/355 + 135/165/195/225% ) physical damage based  on charge time. If Sion charged for at least 0.75 second, enemies are Knocked Up and Stunned for between 1~2s based on charge time.Minions take 60% damage, while Monsters take 120% damage.

w.name: (W) SOUL FURNACE
w.description:
(W) SOUL FURNACE
 14/13/12/11s   65 
                                
                                
                                Sion gains a shield that absorbs 137 (75/100/125/150 + 40%  + 10/12/14/16%  ) damage for 6 seconds.After 2 seconds if the shield still holds, Sion can Recast to detonate the shield to deal 60 (60/90/120/150 + 40% ) plus 10/11/12/13% of their max Health to all nearby enemies.Bonus damage is capped at 400 against monsters. The shield will automatically detonate after 6 seconds.

e.name: (E) ROAR OF THE SLAYER
e.description:
(E) ROAR OF THE SLAYER
 11/10/9/8s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Sion fires a shockwave, dealing 75 (75/120/165/210 + 55% ) magic damage. Slowing them by 50/55/60/65% for 2.5 seconds and removing 20% Armor  for 4 seconds. None-champions hit are Knocked Back. Enemies hit by a Knocked Back until take the same damage and effects.

r.name: (R) UNSTOPPABLE ONSLAUGHT
r.description:
(R) UNSTOPPABLE ONSLAUGHT
 90/70/50s   100 
                                
                                
                                Sion charges Unstoppably in a direction, turning with player input. Sion stops when colliding with an enemy champion, structure, terrain, or when recasting this ability.When this happens, Sion will slam the ground with earth shattering force, dealing between 150 (150/300/450 + 40% bonus ) and 400 (400/800/1200 + 80% bonus ) physical damage while Stunning and Knocking Up enemies for 0.5~1.5s based on charge time.Deals 50% damage to structures.
